item.title: Trump expands access to cannabis in a major shift in drug policy
item.description: The order to place cannabis in the same category as Tylenol with codeine marks the most significant change in US drug policy since 1971.

item.title: HR exec in viral Coldplay clip speaks of abuse, threats and trying to find a new job
item.description: The former tech executive says she was bombarded with abusive and threatening messages after being filmed with her boss on the 'kiss-cam'.

item.title: Wiz Khalifa sentenced to nine months jail in Romania for smoking cannabis on stage
item.description: The rapper, who has been sentenced in absentia, had admitted to smoking a cannabis joint on stage at a festival last year.

item.title: 'She's a superhero': The acts of bravery as Bondi horror unfolded
item.description: A father tells the BBC he owes the life of his child to a stranger forced into an impossible decision.

item.title: Trump Media to merge with fusion energy firm in $6bn deal
item.description: The company behind President Trump's Truth Social platform makes a surprising move into the energy sector.
